profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.2.11 Fonts - 6.2.11.3 Composite fonts - CIDToGIDMap
profile.description: ISO 32000-1:2008, 9.7.4, Table 117 requires that all embedded Type 2 CIDFonts in the CIDFont dictionary shall contain a CIDToGIDMap entry that shall be a stream mapping from CIDs to glyph indices or the name Identity, as described in ISO 32000-1:2008, 9.7.4, Table 117.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium
